content.raw:
thanks because I could not find (in my 30 minutes of research last night) a way to have a docker container use host system libraries and such. 

Also getting networking into a docker container is easy, but getting it out to the host system (communicating with gazebo) looked far trickier.

-aric
content.html:
thanks because I could not find (in my 30 minutes of research last night) a way to have a docker container use host system libraries and such.

Also getting networking into a docker container is easy, but getting it out to the host system (communicating with gazebo) looked far trickier.
